channel.title: BBC News - Wales

item.title: Major changes to cut number of Welsh MPs published
item.description: The Welsh secretary is among the MPs seeing their seats redrawn in the proposals.

item.title: Covid: Positive Anglesey care home staff cover shift amid shortage
item.description: Two care home staff worked to cover a night-shift gap as there was no emergency cover available.

item.title: Weather: Wales sees hottest September night on record
item.description: Tropical temperatures break a 72-year record as the mercury does not dip below 20.5C for 24 hours.

item.title: M4 closed near Chepstow after cow gets on motorway
item.description: Officers are dealing with the animal near the Prince of Wales Bridge.

item.title: Rugby player's six-hour wait for ambulance on pitch
item.description: Eifion Pughe could not be moved as he had fractured his pelvis in two places during a game.

item.title: Q&A: What does the Welsh MP boundary review mean?
item.description: Why is the boundary review - which will see the number of MPs fall from 40 to 32 - taking place?

item.title: Pontypridd market street food Michelin-star chefs for food gong
item.description: Janet Wei beat some chefs who worked in Michelin-star restaurants to claim the title.

item.title: Covid in Wales: No firebreak lockdown planned
item.description: The Welsh government says it is continuing to closely monitor the public health situation.

item.title: Rob Roberts MP suspended from Conservative Party
item.description: Delyn MP who sexually harassed a staff member has his party membership suspended for 12 weeks.

item.title: Skegby Hall: Housemaster sexually abused five boys, court hears
item.description: Nigel Pipe, 87, denies 27 offences alleged to have occurred at an approved boys school.

item.title: Cladding: Cardiff homeowner's tears as safety costs spiral
item.description: As well as increased charges and insurance costs, many owners also face expensive repair work.

item.title: Rare angelshark filmed in Welsh waters 'for first time'
item.description: Angelsharks are an endangered species but the young spotting proves they are breeding in the UK

item.title: Dementia in dogs 'heartbreaking', says Wrexham woman
item.description: Staffie cross Poppy is one of the 10% of dogs with dementia who get a diagnosis.

item.title: Iron Age hillfort at risk from the sea in Gwynedd
item.description: Archaeologists return to a 2,000-year-old Welsh hillfort which is being reclaimed by the Irish Sea.

item.title: Recycling: How do you transform old PPE into something new?
item.description: Turning millions of disposable masks and medical waste into new items is one firm's new mission.

item.title: Wheelchair Moto Cross: Teen's push for Paralympic recognition
item.description: Lily Rice is already a world champion - and now wants to see her sport given a Paralympic stage

item.title: Firefighters tackle large Blaenavon recycling plant blaze
item.description: Residents living nearby have been advised to keep windows and doors closed due to smoke.

item.title: Wales v Estonia: Robert Page welcomes return of unlimited crowds for World Cup qualifier in Cardiff
item.description: Robert Page welcomes return of unlimited crowds as Wales aim to climb to second place in their World Cup qualifying group by beating Estonia in Cardiff.

item.title: Freak eye injury left Cardiff's Will Boyde struggling to see new-born daughter
item.description: Cardiff's Will Boyde describes the aftermath of a "freak" injury that led to months of lost vision.

item.title: Newport County: Goldie Lookin' Chain inspire League Two club's kit
item.description: Newport County unveil a new third kit inspired by comedy hip hop act Goldie Lookin' Chain.

item.title: Owain Doull: Welshman set to leave Ineos Grenadiers
item.description: Owain Doull is set to leave Ineos Grenadiers at the end of the season and join a rival Grand Tour team.

item.title: Jade Knight: Scrum-half calls time on Wales career
item.description: Wales and Saracens scrum-half Jade Knight retires from international rugby citing a lack of support as a mother.

item.title: Aros chwe awr am ambiwlans ar ôl torri pelfis mewn gêm rygbi
item.description: Roedd rhaid i Eifion Pughe aros oriau cyn derbyn triniaeth ar ôl iddo dorri ei belfis yn chwarae i dîm Machynlleth.

item.title: Cartref gofal yn defnyddio staff sydd â Covid-19
item.description: Perchennog y cartref yng Nghaergybi yn dweud iddi erioed weld "argyfwng" staffio fel hyn o'r blaen.

item.title: Rob Roberts wedi'i wahardd o'r Blaid Geidwadol am 12 wythnos
item.description: Mae AS Delyn wedi wynebu galwadau i ymddiswyddo wedi iddo aflonyddu'n rhywiol ar aelod o'i staff.

item.title: 'Y Gymraeg yn iaith amlethnig erioed'
item.description: Mewn llyfr newydd mae Simon Brooks yn dweud fod lleiafrifoedd ethnig Cymraeg wedi bodoli ers canrifoedd.

item.title: Crasfa arall i Forgannwg yn erbyn Durham
item.description: Y tîm cartref yn selio'r fuddugoliaeth ar y diwrnod olaf, oedd yn edrych yn anochel ers rhai dyddiau.
